text:
I would like to go in " sciences de l'éducation" at university because in the past year i stayed five days in a classroom of "grande section/CP". In this five days i can see somes specialities of the teacher profession and I think that this profession is very interesant.
I amire the teacher who is passionated and attentive to her childerns, however she had write 2 books edition of reading methologie who is "pilotis" who his using by a lot of schools Paris and his islands.
In addition in this clasroom this theacher use the "montessori" methology and i thing that this women had a perfct using of this because childrens are more and more independant in the classroom and I see that they can evoluted more in theire learning. she give somes libeties and responsabilities to her childrens so i thinks that is permeted them to learn by they own means. however this autonomies permeted to the teacher to be more time with the child who have somes difficuties.
For me this theacher is a real inspiration beacuse she had a big and long carriere in school, education and methologie of education.
This teacher work in collaboration with "orthophonistes" and "psychomotricien" for the purpose of give the best lesson to her class.
Finally this woman give me lot of things for the teacher profession.
